title: Delhi Indian Cuisine
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Indian, Buffet, Salad bar, Take-out, Catering, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Indian cuisine restaurant established 2014. Features a lunch buffet spread daily until 3pm. The dinner a la carte menu has a vegetarian main entrees section labeled "From the garden" plus there are vegetarian appetizers and chaat snacks. Its print menu marks with a vegan symbol which dishes are vegan suitable, including vegan specials.
